actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the extension of credit to Guam for the development of community facilities on Guam, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the extension of credit to Guam for the development of community facilities on Guam. Authorizes $40,000,000 to be appropriated to the Secretary of the Interior to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the extension of credit to Guam for the development of community facilities on Guam, and for other purposes.
